forumNotes.author: Tonton_Glenn
forumNotes.content:
For more detail, install **grub4dos** on ure USB key and copie *gldr* and *menu.lst* files on it. Copy ure VistaPE Files on the root of the usb flash drive and use this code in menu.lst : ``` title VistaPE - Windows Vista Portable chainloader /BOOTMGR ```
++ ![:good:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/good.gif)
